nodes.text: The Jidlor Marches was a Mid Rim sector. By 0 ABY, it bordered the Marzoon, Tashtor, Halm, and Oriolan sectors to the south, and shared its northern border with the Freestanding subsectors. To the east, the Jidlor Marches formed the Mid Rim's boundary with the Expansion Region's Har Worlds sector. The Jidlor Marches contained the Jidlor system, which was home to the sentient Swaze species.

The Jidlor Marches was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas. The sector was depicted on a map designed by Modi and published in the 2012 StarWars.com article The Essential Atlas Extra: Sectors of the Mid Rim.
